version_description:
• Fixed layout problems for iPhone 6/6+
• Added Retina HD Graphics
• Native iOS 8 Build
• Minor bug fixes

This release primarily adds support for iPhone 6/6+ devices and corrects all known bugs related to the new iOS 8 release. Thanks for all the feedback and support while we worked to get this version ready. Please let us know if you encounter any problems using the app on the new iPhone or iOS releases.

• Fixed layout problems for iPhone 6/6+
• Added Retina HD Graphics
• Native iOS 8 Build
• Minor bug fixes

Thanks for all the feedback and support while we worked to get this version ready. Please let us know if you encounter any problems using the app on the new iPhone or iOS releases.

• Fixed layout problems for iPhone 6/6+
• Added Retina HD Graphics
• Native iOS 8 Build
• Minor bug fixes

This release primarily adds support for iPhone 6/6+ devices and corrects all known bugs related to the new iOS 8 release. Thanks for all the feedback and support while we worked to get this version ready. Please let us know if you encounter any problems using the app on the new iPhone or iOS releases.

• 64-bit support
• Scientific notation for display, history, and e-mail values
• Pop-up display mode selection menu (long-press gesture)
• Fixed UI layout bug for iPhone 6+, 6s+, 7+ devices
• Code optimizations & clean-up
• Expanded help/how-to information
• Assorted bug fixes

This version features 64-bit code support for optimal performance on the latest IOS devices. Thanks for all the feedback and support while we worked to get this version out—sorry it took so long. Please let us know if you encounter any problems using the app on the new iPhone or iOS releases. Enjoy!

• Fixed UI layout bug for iPhone 6+, 6s+, 7+ devices
• Code optimizations & clean-up
• Expanded help/how-to information
• Assorted bug fixes

This version is a replacement for the recent v1.2.4 release that adds a fix for iPhone devices running with with zoomed display mode. Thanks for all the feedback and support while we worked to get this version out—sorry it took so long. Please let us know if you encounter any problems using the app on the new iPhone or iOS releases. Enjoy!

Thanks for all the feedback and support while we worked to get this version out—sorry it took so long. Please let us know if you encounter any problems using the app on the new iPhone or iOS releases. Enjoy!

• Native iOS 11 build
• Support for iPhone X Super Retina HD Display
• Major update of UI code
• Code optimizations & clean-up
• Minor bug fixes

The primary focus of this release is a major reworking of the user interface code to better support new and upcoming iOS devices. Most of these changes are internal and should not be visible to the user. Thanks for all the feedback and support while we worked to get this version out. Please let us know if you encounter any problems using the app. Enjoy!

• Updated for iOS 13
• Fixes crash during startup on iOS 13
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

This is a minor release to correct a critical bug that causes the app to crash when launching it on iOS 13. Thanks for all the feedback and bug reports during the iOS 13 Beta test. Please let us know if you encounter any problems using the app. Enjoy!

• Updated for iOS 13
• Fixes crash during startup on iOS 13
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

This is a minor release to correct a critical bug that causes the app to crash when launching it on iOS 13. Thanks for all the feedback and bug reports during the iOS 13 Beta test. Please let us know if you encounter any problems using the app. Enjoy!
